name: Dryad
flavor: A nature spirit in the form of a humanoid tree.

features.name: Bramble Patch - Action
features.desc: Mark a Stress to target a point within Far range. Create a patch of thorns that covers an area within Close range of that point. All targets within that area take 2d6+2 physical damage when they act. A target must succeed on a Finesse Roll or take more than 20 damage to the Dryad with an attack to leave the area.

features.name: Group Saplings - Action
features.desc: Spend a Fear to grow three Treant Sapling Minions, who appear at Close range and immediately take the spotlight.

features.name: We Are All One - Reaction
features.desc: When an ally dies within Close range, you can spend a Fear to clear 2 HP and 2 Stress as the fallen allyâ€™s life force is returned to the forest.
